## Events.CommentMove class

Notifies listeners that a workspace comment has moved.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CommentMove extends CommentBase 
```
**Extends:** [CommentBase](./blockly.events_namespace.commentbase_class.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(opt\_comment)](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class._constructor__1_constructor.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>CommentMove</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [comment\_?](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.comment__property.md) |  | [WorkspaceComment](./blockly.comments_namespace.workspacecomment_class.md) | _(Optional)_ The comment that is being moved. |
|  [newCoordinate\_?](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.newcoordinate__property.md) |  | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | _(Optional)_ The location of the comment after the move, in workspace coordinates. |
|  [oldCoordinate\_?](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.oldcoordinate__property.md) |  | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | _(Optional)_ The location of the comment before the move, in workspace coordinates. |
|  [reason?](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.reason_property.md) |  | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ An explanation of what this move is for. Known values include: 'drag' -- A drag operation completed. 'snap' -- Comment got shifted to line up with the grid. 'inbounds' -- Block got pushed back into a non-scrolling workspace. 'create' -- Block created via deserialization. 'cleanup' -- Workspace aligned top-level blocks. Event merging may create multiple reasons: \['drag', 'inbounds', 'snap'\]. |
|  [type](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.type_property.md) |  | EventType |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [isNull()](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.isnull_1_method.md) |  | Does this event record any change of state? |
|  [recordNew()](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.recordnew_1_method.md) |  | Record the comment's new location. Called after the move. Can only be called once. |
|  [run(forward)](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.run_1_method.md) |  | Run a move event. |
|  [setOldCoordinate(xy)](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.setoldcoordinate_1_method.md) |  | Override the location before the move. Use this if you don't create the event until the end of the move, but you know the original location. |
|  [setReason(reason)](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.setreason_1_method.md) |  | Sets the reason for a move event. |
|  [toJson()](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.tojson_1_method.md) |  | Encode the event as JSON. |
